sentences: Ryō Fukawa (ふかわりょう, Fukawa Ryō, born August 19, 1974 in Yokohama, Kanagawa), also known as ROCKETMAN, is a Japanese comedian and musician.
On television he generally takes minor roles and is characterized by his childlike temperament and boyish looks.
He is also a member of the owarai group, No Plan.
Fukawa graduated from the Department of Economics at Keio University.
He is cousin to manga artist Tetsuo Hara.
